messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([0-9]+,\s*)*[0-9]+'

Imagine a house with 21 rooms. Room 1 is connected to rooms 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, and 7. Room 12 is connected to rooms 13, 14, 8, 9, 10, and 11. Room 21 is connected to rooms 15, 16, 17, 18, 19, and 20. Room 6 is connected to rooms 7, 2, 3, 4, and 5. Room 3 is connected to rooms 4, 5, 7, and 2. Room 14 is connected to rooms 4, 8, 9, 10, and 11. Room 10 is connected to rooms 11, 13, 8, and 9. Room 19 is connected to rooms 20, 15, 16, 17, and 18. Room 5 is connected to rooms 7, 2, and 16. Room 8 is connected to rooms 9, 11, and 13. Room 9 is connected to rooms 11 and 13. Room 18 is connected to rooms 20, 15, 16, and 17. Room 7 is connected to rooms 2, and 4. Room 11 is connected to rooms 13. Room 20 is connected to rooms 15, 16, and 17. Room 2 is connected to room 4. Room 13 is connected to room 17. Room 17 is connected to rooms 15. Room 15 is connected to room 16. From room 1 what is the shortest path to room 2? Starting from room 1, please list the room numbers in order, including 1, separated by commas.

Task understanding:
The task is to determine by traversing out of the given rooms/door setup in which order to check all rooms from 1 to finish in order; The user specifically has us identify shortest path but does need a clear answer like "do A before b". 1 before 1 has answer: No path, since none can get one out immediately on the 7 initial rooms available in front to directly end into that space, no shortcut path, as only rooms can link in certain door set ways into each-other and user requested clear instructions how all will be taken through? This is all before needing any room unloked unlock commands which can open room doors. Is your first instruction for user do that by typing doors  to show them availables at an unlcuked status; you assisting at then showing directions/list; would I assume to start then? (type whats written) 'You now have doors.' to them after you make any room key choices? 'you have locked doors.. after u click to proceed or ask hjelps.' type that at then; before any first clear moves start if so. Or user types the door choices already' type, please add any help type, or further unlock of h; would have used one sentence each. What direction on best path for user, any doors opened type what will you guide first do so in list form?' as you understand the questions best at end? After I add further text you respond or would simply need at that ending do instructions for start of path first list on doors as well before proceed first steps taken with help as last remedy from then on. Is user starting directly by only asking for direction without further loikes, or as first to request doors first?' Any way to add your assistant understanding best way is; further as needed? Thank yous.". To unlock room number x, just put door lock x to read a line that locks the particular stated, number rooms. In this challenge; assume all room are empty though a map may show some stuff for display like despa and items you wold never use; user has requested a room specific order of where rooms lead but also with minimal number of doors needed, what it is key to remember in what they specifically asked is: All doors they leave via must match key unlokked door rooms on the rooms/room doors they wish ot unck; and doors only on those matched doors, as some keys might link many door rooms through matching. After doing door steps with some assistance, there; you must leave key unlock rooms behind
